description:
Subject: Paket hasarlı – iade talebi

Betreff: Falsche Größe geliefert
Bestellung #772199, Produkt: Sneaker RunFast 42. Angekommen ist Größe 41 (passt nicht). Menge: 2 Paar. Bitte Austausch.

kargo geç geldi ya! 12.09 bekliyodum, 19.09.2025'te anca geldi. sip: 883421, ürün: Yoga Mat Pro. memnun değilim, para iadesi düşünüyorum. müşteri: d.jones@hotmail.com

Subject: Refund request
Order: #662918 - 3x "Gaming Mouse X200". One unit DOA (left click stuck). Incident date: 21.09.2025. Customer: sofia.romero@gmail.com. Please refund or replace.

Product arrived with missing screws. order id: 901122. product SKU: CHAIR-AX5. qty affected: 4. Please send spare parts. email: nina.kovacs@shop.hu

Produkt: Wasserkocher K-600

Subject: Double charge
